spell.firesenderexpansion.partial_telepo: Selectively teleport a part of a person's body. Deals more damage the less mana they have.
spell.firesenderexpansion.aspect_of_the_: Manifest a homing shulker bullet when you hit an entity with a magic attack.
spell.firesenderexpansion.dimensional_tr: Use ancient Ender knowledge collected across all 3 dimensions to survive against each dimension's perils.
spell.firesenderexpansion.obsidian_rod.g: Fire a series of extradimensional obsidian rods at your opponent, grounding them in this reality and preventing them from teleporting.
spell.firesenderexpansion.hollow_crystal: Manifest an impossibility of Ender magic and send it outwards, moving through blocks and devastating anything in its path.
Manifest a small vacuum in the world, drawing everyone nearby into an existence where all is void. The space will collapse shortly after existing, but while active you will also gain significant mana regeneration.
